title: Nigeria Oil Output Averages 1 . 46mbpd , Misses OPEC Quota
description: Nigeria's oil output averaged 1.46mbpd from Jan-Oct 2025, falling short of its OPEC quota and the national budget benchmark, impacting government revenue.
